page.title: 19Events in Appleby
page.content: Different associations and individuals join in a fancy dress parade organised by the British Legion which is led by a brass band through the streets of Appleby.We have sports and teas.It is all colourful and exciting.Floats and costumes may win prizes.There is also a Band of Hope parade every year. Because this is a farming area every year in August we have an Agricultural Show where people can show animals.There are tents for horticultural produce,cooking,baking and children's classes. Gypsies have come from all over the country for 300 years to Appleby horse fair.The fair is in June and they stay a week dealing in horses.Some caravans are the hooped caravans.Many have crystal vases and Crown Derby china. Claire Ward and Julia Dayson
